actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Angel Maldonado-Valverde, Lusila Delgado de Maldonado, Francisco Maldonado-Delgado, Dora Luz Maldonado-Delgado, and Jose Luis Maldonado-Delgado.

summary.text: Declares five named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Angel Maldonado-Valverde, Lusila Delgado de Maldonado, Francisco Maldonado-Delgado, Dora Luz Maldonado-Delgado, and Jose Luis Maldonado-Delgado.
